name: Practical Updates In Primary Care Virtual Series
content: This is Where Inspiring Conversation Meets World-Class Education. This year, we're offering four opportunities to attend a meeting with like-minded professionals that works for you and your schedule. We're delivering this vital education conveniently online and on-demand to fit your busy lifestyle. Engage from your home with leading primary care clinicians, specialists, and other thought-leaders from across the country to gain practical updates and share best practices through live Q and A, panel discussions, one-on-one networking, and a virtual exhibit hall. Grab your preferred device - laptop, phone, or tablet - and settle in for three days of engaging, case-based sessions led by world-class educators motivated to help you improve patient outcomes. Choose the date that works best for you: May 12-15 July 15-17 September 23-25 November 11-13 Explore 3 days of accredited activities with 20+ sessions led by industry leaders covering topics such as: Mediterranean Diet for Heart Health Improving Dementia Care Early Identification of PsA in Office Exams Long-Haul COVID-19 in Primary Care Safety and Efficacy of Anti-Obesity Medications and more! Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/742345-2?pid=4868 Time: 08:00 to 18:00 Prices: Student/Fellow/Resident/Military: USD 49.00, Industry: USD 499.00, MD/DO: USD 149.00, NP/PA/Allied/Pharmacist: USD 99.00 Speakers: Timothy Harlan, MD, Angela Fitch, MD, Kathryn Evans Kreider, DNP, FNP-BC, BC-ADM, FAANP, Cindy Cooke, DNP, FNP-C, FAANP, Jeffrey P. Levine, MD, MPH, Maureen Moriarty, DNP, APRN, FAHS, FAANP, Barak Gaster, MD, Angela Golden, DNP, FNP-C, FAANP, Joseph F. Merola, MD, MMSc, Alessio Fasano, MD, Amanda Cohn, MD, Aric A. Prather, PhD
